name: Heal the Beat
description:
Athens Global Game Jam 2020 submission. 

Theme: Repair

Objective: Match the color of the bean with the color of the robot in order to heal it. The mecha needs to survive until the end of the song!

Controls:

  1. A or D to rotate the card's/colors wheel;
  2. Space to select the bottom card and combine with the already selected cards;

Game's Submission Link: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/heal-beat-4
